title: Influx BigV Profile
description: Simplified profile schema for BigV influencer entries per POR pivot. Captures core identity, status, 30-day metrics, and metadata/provenance for high-quality author indexing.

id.description: Twitter author_id as a numeric string.

handle.description: Twitter username (handle) without leading @. 1-15 chars, alphanumeric or underscore only.

name.description: Profile display name as shown on Twitter.

followers_count.description: Follower count at time of last refresh.

is_org.description: Whether this account represents an organization, brand, or media entity rather than an individual.

is_official.description: Whether this account is an official/PR account for an organization or individual.

lang_primary.description: Primary language code (ISO 639-1, with optional ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code).

topic_tags.description: Topic/domain tags for classification and filtering.

score.description: Overall influence score (proxy or full model).

last_refresh_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this record was last refreshed.

sources.description: Data sources used to assemble this record.

method.description: Acquisition method, e.g., twitter-api-v2, firehose, web-scrape, manual.

fetched_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the source was fetched.

evidence.description: Freeform evidence or reference (e.g., query details, URL, or notes).

provenance_hash.description: SHA-256 hex digest capturing provenance snapshot for this record.

entry_threshold_passed.description: Whether the record passed influx-harvest pipeline entry thresholds.

rank_global.description: Global rank position among all profiles (1 = highest).

last_active_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of most recent observed activity.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Optional implementation-specific custom fields. Keys/values are not validated by this schema.
